sect1.title: XQuery Interface
sect1.para: In general query's context node may either be a single resource or a collection.
This page asks which option to be used for query context (the values/selection will be asked on the next screen depending of type selected here):

simplelist.member: DAV Collection - local WebDAV collection containing a resources
Database Table - document kept in a table
External URL - external document or external WebDAV collection
No context - an empty document will be used for context node

sect1.para: The DAV browser allows selecting a resource or collection from the local DAV space. If a collection is selected, all XML resources therein are concatenated into a forest as by the collection function. This is placed under an element node called "root" and is used as the context of the query.
if an external resource is desired as the context node, the URL may be entered. This will be retrieved either with the collection or the doc function, as indicated by the check-box.

Because many resources are not well formed, the check-box Skip Malformed allows skipping resources which are not parseable as XML from the context collection. The Parse as HTML checkbox will parse HTML, correcting tag nesting.
